    • Method Detail

      • addReservation

        public ReservationIdDto addReservation​(ReservationDto reservationDto)
        method is used to add a new reservation to app
        Parameters:
        reservationDto - is a object made from: date, start and end hours and chosen pitch given by user
        Returns:
        reservation id as a response of properly added reservation given from repository

      • getReservationByPitchIdAndDate

        public java.util.List<ReservationDto> getReservationByPitchIdAndDate​(java.lang.Integer whichPitch,
                                                                     java.time.LocalDate reservationDate)
        method is used to get existing reservations from app (on selected pitch and date)
        Parameters:
        whichPitch - is a pitch id from which we are eager to get reservations
        reservationDate - is a chosen date from which we are eager to get reservations
        Returns:
        list of reservations existing on selected pitch and date as a response from repository

      • getReservationByWhichUser

        public java.util.List<ReservationDto> getReservationByWhichUser​(java.lang.String whichUser)
        method is used to get existing reservations from app (for logged user)
        Parameters:
        whichUser - is a user login for whom we are eager to get reservations
        Returns:
        list of reservations which current user have as a response from repository

      • cancelReservation

        public void cancelReservation​(int reservationId)
        method is used to remove an existing reservation from app
        Parameters:
        reservationId - is a reservation id which we are eager to delete from app
